p: Jiajun Luo et al., at the end of 2018, published work [ 74] where authors showed that by the modification of the chemical composition of all-inorganic double perovskites, in particular, by alloying Na cations into Cs 2AgInCl 6 via hydrothermal method, resulted in suppression the dark transitions. Thus, highly luminescent powders were obtained with PLQY up to 86%. It was shown that optimally alloyed Cs 2(Ag 0.60Na 0.40)InCl 6 with 0.04% Bi doping perovskite emits warm-white light with luminance 5000 cd m âˆ’2 for over 1000 h ( Figure 3c,d).
